civilians and official personnel alike attended this event .
old glory swayed in the wind above us as we celebrated .

output.sentences: The organization, The Honor Network, sponsored a statue in remembrance of our servicemen.
Many civilians, official personell, and families arrived for the event.
A gentle wind swayed the US flag, everyone in awe of the glory of the day.
Trained servicemen assisted in the unveiling of the statue.
The nation memorialized its heroes forever this day.
